product_name: NYX Professional MakeupSmushy Matte Lip Balm
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeGive BackMeet NYX Professional Makeup Smushy Matte Lip Balm! Get smushy-soft lips with this formula infused with mochi rice powder and sugar ceramides.
details: DetailsFeaturesSmack, Smooch, Smushy The smushy-soft texture applies with a lip balm feel for all-day comfort that feels as good as it looks.This vegan lip formula is your must-have ticket to cloud-like, pillow-soft lips with a sweet diffused matte finish.The smushy-soft texture applies with a lip balm feel for all-day comfort that feels as good as it looksJust smush it and swipe on for a perfect wash of buildable, soft-focus lip colorWhether you're going for a barely-there nude, your new go-to blush, or a pop of peachy color, Smushy Matte Lip Balm has you covered with versatile shades designed to suit any vibe on any occasionAll of these fluffy shades have a sweet scent for a multisensory experience to help every sweet tooth find their match.BenefitsInfused with mochi rice powder and sugar ceramidesIt's lip care, reinvented - vegan, cruelty-free, and oh-so-satisfying. Smush so smooth, it's smackin'!Item 2640706How To UseDesigned with a flexible, silicone applicator tip for a super-soft glide and even softer lips! Smooth, comfy-matte lips in a single smush.IngredientsSwipe Sesh: Dimethicone, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Dimethicone/Vinyltrimethylsiloxysilicate Crosspolymer, Tribehenin, Acrylates Copolymer, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, CI 77491 / Iron Oxides, Parfum / Fragrance, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter / Shea Butter, Diisostearyl Malate, CI 77499 / Iron Oxides, Polyglyceryl-2 Diisostearate, Ceramide Np, Tocopheryl Acetate, Oryza Sativa Powder / Rice Powder, CI 15850 / Red 7, Aluminum Hydroxide, Dehydroacetic Acid, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, CI 77492 / Iron Oxides (F.I.L. N70057082/1).
how_to_use: Designed with a flexible, silicone applicator tip for a super-soft glide and even softer lips! Smooth, comfy-matte lips in a single smush.

reviews.headline: 10/10 smells amazing
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I got this in the color Snuggle Szn and I love it so much. The shade is a brownish pink on my skin, really pretty just like the cap color. It is however sheer and blends out to almost nothing. The texture isn't sticky at all instead it's smooth and fluffy... almost dusty? I wouldn't say it's super hydrating because of that but my lips do feel soft after applying so it's doing something. 
Most important part is I loveee the scent of this, it smells exactly like the powder from those cups of instant milk tea I get at 99 cent ranch. No taste though. Oh and I'm not in love with the tube design but it's not ugly or anything, just not cute to me. Overall, worth it for me!

reviews.headline: Fun packaging and hydrating!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] The lilac hued packaging with a bubble bottom is almost too cute to use! NYX nailed the look of this matte clear lip balm from the outside to the applicator, perfect for Cupid's bow lips! The actual balm is like a thick chapstick, layered on lips in a smooth fashion and no tint. I normally would just stick to my usual chapstick, but applying it now is fun thanks to the cute look of it!

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I LOVED IT SO MUCH! i used a little bit and smudged my lip since it has a very sharp color! The texture is smooth and it blends with lips so easily! It is also very affordable and easy to use and take everywhere!' The only con is it kinda form a bit or texture on lips sometimes

reviews.headline: Smooth Balm
reviews.comments: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. It's the most reliable little Matte Lip Balm! It's so smooth on the lips and when applying it just runs smooth. It's long lasting (wore it on my wedding day). The packaging is cute and unique. Definitely will purchase again!

reviews.headline: Such a great lip product
reviews.comments: I love this product. So smooth and moisturizing. Goes on easy and has a completely matte finish. No sticky residue and so easy to use. I use it multiple times ska day but you don't have to constantly reapply. I would recommend this product to everyone.

reviews.headline: Smooth
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I really enjoyed the texture of this lip balm. It felt very smooth when applying and for a while after. It didn't feel sticky or tacky. The color I chose was too pink for me, but I'd love to try other colors. I'd say it lasted a good amount of time for only being a lip balm. It's such a reasonable price, I'll definitely be purchasing a few others!

reviews.headline: I would buy again
reviews.comments: I loved that it gave a lasting color but wasn't anything too over the top

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: Color is buildable and I love how it feels on my lips. Lasting power is similar to a lip gloss.

reviews.headline: It wasn't that bad
reviews.comments: I wasn't horrible but it's not worth it, the hydration did last my lips were dry, save your money

reviews.headline: Quite nice
reviews.comments: If you like the summer Fridays lip balm if this is a great affordable option, it has a strong smell to it, but it is very hydrating and really good

reviews.headline: Great color!
reviews.comments: The scent on this specific shade is good! It's not too overpowering. I love the color since it matches my natural lip color. It's a little tricky at first to use but still would recommend.

reviews.headline: Unique Formula
reviews.comments: I really like this formula. Smushy Matte is the perfect descriptor for this lip product. It leaves behind a soft color that is not sticky. It doesn't fade on the lips and has decent lasting power. You can build it up the color to a certain point, but it is not going to be completely opaque like a lipstick or anything like that.

reviews.headline: NASTY chemical smell
reviews.comments: got the clear sugar one, it smells so incredibly bad, all of my friends think it smells terrible. smells like cleaner. gross

reviews.headline: Very nice
reviews.comments: I purchased the clear version for the purpose of putting atop matte or liquid lipsticks that are a bit too drying. I find this product serves my intended purpose as it conditions my lips without compromising the mattness of the particular look I'm trying to achieve. All in all, very nice.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Smushy Matte lip balm is just wonderful! It smells so delicious that I can eat it! Delicate chocolate shade, delicate creamy base softly colors and does not dry out lips! I want to try other shadesüòç

reviews.headline: Velvet Lippie
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] For any fan of matte lippies, this is a must.
I'm usually more of a gloss girl but could appreciate that the formula felt like velvet. It had a nice cloud like texture and great color payoff.
Like most mattes though, don't expect this to be super straining.

reviews.headline: Awful!
reviews.comments: Hard pass on this one.  The color would not apply evenly, and 30 minutes later, my lips looked like I had a messy, thick lip liner on, no color at all in the middle. The feel was also thin and oily, not at all balm-like.

reviews.headline: I love this lip balm!
reviews.comments: This is a very moisturizing mat lip balm. I always reach for in my purse. I always get compliments on my lip combo. When I use this I have the purple one and the scent of vanilla is amazing. [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Amazing cool texture! Matte and smooth! Very effective at staying on and moisturizing. Very unique and trendy Packaging. very good and affordable Price point. amazing Scent.

reviews.headline: I love it
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I tried the NYX Smushy Matte Lip Balm and love it! It goes on smooth, feels super comfy, and gives a nice matte finish without drying my lips. The color payoff is great for a balm, and it's easy to throw in my bag for touch-ups.

reviews.headline: Love the texture
reviews.comments: Unfortunately, the color is more brown and less berry than I expected. I'll keep it, but keep looking for the right color in something else.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I received this product in exchange for my honest review. Thank you @nyx for sending this over so I could try it out! Product was gifted in exchange for my review. 

I was quite curious about how this product would feel on my lips as it's marketed as a smushy matte lip balm. Having used it for 6 weeks I think the name is the perfect description. These are my impressions!

This is such an interesting product! The texture is smooth and plushy, I get primer vibes which is probably from the dimethicone ingredient (silicone based polymer). 

The shade SMB11 - Squeeze N' Sizzle packs a punch, I like how it can be worn as a light layer or built up a bit to give a more full intense color. The product is comfortable to wear on the lips and lasts a decently long time. If I apply in the morning, I'll still have some color on my lips by the afternoon. The formula is not drying. It's not super hydrating either, it more of keeps your lips in the same state they were when you initially apply it. 

There is fragrance, I can't quite place it. It's almost like 90s cherry / fruit punch scent. It's not super strong but it's definitely there. 

The product is packaged in a plastic tube with a flattened circular cap. To dispense the product you have to squeeze the tube. The product can fully stand on its own which is a fun way to display it on my desk.

I think the product is fun and innovative. I am not certain I would repurchase at this moment in time as I want to see how the formula lasts in the tube over a longer period of time. I'm curious if any natural separation will occur.
faceoff_positive.headline: Interesting product, long lasting color

faceoff_negative.comments:
BRUTALLY HER, BRUTALLY HONEST: 
This is the only lip balm I've ever really used, so I'm judging it based purely on what it does, not how it stacks up.

‚óã Packaging: 8/10
It's cute! It's small enough to fit in my pockets and I think the round cap is a nice touch. It sort of reminds me of what Rare Beauty has going on. It could be easily accessible to open for those that struggle with such things. I can see how impractical it might be considering if you want to store it but I personally don't have a problem with it.

‚óã Application & Texture: 7.5/10
It glides on. I like the silicone application. It's very soft, slightly slick at first. Then it sets down into a semi-matte, velvety finish. Not glossy, not shiny, just soft and smooth. If your lips are already in good shape, it feels nice and comfy. If they're flakey or cracked, it will highlight that a bit.

‚óã Scent: 7/10
It smells sweet, like some sort of bubblegum. Very candy-like. Personally, I don't mind it, but it is strong at first and it lingers for about 10-15 minutes. If you don't like scented products near your nose, this might be a problem.

‚óã Hydration: 6.5/10
This is not your emergency, overnight, lip-saver balm. It's not ultra nourishing. It gives a soft layer of moisture and prevents lips from feeling dry for a while, but if your lips are chapped, this won't fix that. After a couple hours, I feel like I definitely need to reapply OR need to top up with something thicker or more hydrating.

‚óã Finish & Look: 8.5/10
It's clear, but NOT glossy. It gives a soft, blurred look like a filter on Snapchat or TikTok. Feels low maintenance and natural, which I love. I've worn it alone and under lipgloss, and it plays well with both.

‚óã Lasting Power: 5/10
Stays on for 2-3 hours if you're not eating or drinking. After that, it kind of fades without making a mess. No weird residue, just‚Ä¶ gone. Reapplying is easy.

‚óã Overall Rating: 7/10
‚Ä¢ Pros: Lightweight, velvety texture, clear matte finish, cute packaging, reapply-friendly
‚Ä¢ Cons: Not deeply moisturizing, weird shape to store, strong scent, not great on chapped lips

It's cute, it's trendy, and it feels nice. Just don't expect miracles if your lips are struggling. For me, it's a solid "everyday casual balm" NOT a treatment, but something to toss on when I want my lips to feel soft and look a little more polished.
faceoff_negative.headline: Cute, casual everyday balm
